fr.free.jnizet.retry

Interface WaitStrategy


  • public interface WaitStrategy
    A strategy used to decide how long to sleep before retrying, after a failed attempt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long computeSleepTime(int previousAttemptNumber, long delaySinceFirstAttemptInMillis)
      Returns the time, in milliseconds, to sleep before retrying

    • Method Detail

      • computeSleepTime

        long computeSleepTime(int previousAttemptNumber,
                    long delaySinceFirstAttemptInMillis)
        Returns the time, in milliseconds, to sleep before retrying
        Parameters:
        previousAttemptNumber - the number, starting from 1, of the previous (failed) attempt
        delaySinceFirstAttemptInMillis - the delay since the start of the first attempt, in milliseconds
